description:
People who sustain injuries in Orlando, Florida, can turn to the law firm of LaVoie & Kaizer, P.A., to find experienced advocates at the negotiation table and in court. Our attorneys are skilled litigators who know the strategies large insurance companies use to get out of paying fair compensation. We are not afraid to go head to head with them in court, fighting for the compensation our clients deserve.

Our law firm represents victims of assault, battery or sexual abuse, as well as those who have suffered due to the mistakes of a health care provider or the neglect or abuse of nursing home facility staff. We also handle cases involving:

  • Motor vehicle collisions
  • Admiralty and maritime matters
  • Aviation and mass transit accidents
  • Animal bites
  • Birth injuries
  • Brain injuries
  • Construction accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Dangerous products

When someone dies due to another's negligence or recklessness, our law firm helps family members to hold the responsible parties liable for the loss.

We keep our caseloads small so that our attorneys are able to dedicate themselves fully to each client. From the free initial consultation on, clients work directly with their attorney, whether in person, by phone or virtual appointment. In addition to our Orlando office, we also have locations in Tampa and Clearwater.

At LaVoie & Kaizer, P.A., our fees are lower than the standard, we work on a contingency fee basis, and we accept credit cards for our clients' maximum convenience.
